パッケージ xyz.mlserver.util.serialization

クラス ClassSerializer<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.mlserver.util.serialization.ClassSerializer<T>
  • public class ClassSerializer<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Serializes/Deserializes an object that does not implement Serializable. See here for examples.

    • コンストラクタの概要

      • deserialize

        @Contract(pure=true)
public static <T> T deserialize​(@Nullable
                                @Nullable java.lang.Class<T> clazz,

      • deserialize

        @Contract(value="_, null -> null",
          pure=true)
public static <T> T deserialize​(@Nullable
                                @Nullable java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                @Nullable
                                @Nullable YamlObject object)
        Try to deserialize yaml object. Class may be null, and it will find class automatically if null. If not null, the specified class will be used, but it you must specify the implementation class.
        型パラメータ:
        T - output type
        パラメータ:
        clazz - the class (just for type)
        object - the yaml object data to deserialize
        戻り値:
        the deserialized value
